dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not for much longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes the camera through an open small window, turns toward the course. Mater DROPS down again ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FINN and HOLLEY CLICK FORWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big Bentley's big hand CLICKS ahead another minute. But w a bit farther away from it than before.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: We came as soon as you called. 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sally, flanked by Red, Flo and Ramone, are in front of --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- McQueen and the rest of the team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I called to talk to Mater. It never occurred to me that he wouldn't be there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheriff is talking to Scotland Yard right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Sarge is in touch with his friends in the British military.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just need to focus on the race.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, but Sal, with everything going on I'm not sure I should---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HORN O.S. Someone's entering the pit. Everyone parts, revealing MILES AXLEROD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir Axlerod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry to interrupt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, it's all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanted to come down here and personally thank you. Because after Italy, I was finished. And then you gave me one last shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, I ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I probably shouldn't be saying this at all but... I hope you win today. Show the world that they've been wrong about Allinol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen takes this in. He looks at Sally. 105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater would want you to race.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. For Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MCQUEEN, FRANCESCO and the other racers PEEL OUT ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PAN UP to reveal the LEMONHEADS watching from a VIP bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen leads Francesco as they approach Big Bentley...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here he comes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem turns up the juice to the HIGHEST, DEATH-INDUCING LE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley and Finn watch, helpless. Mater closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem ZAPS MCQUEEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen SPEEDS PAST Big Bentley, unharmed. Oblivious to w was supposed to have just happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zundapp suddenly SQUAWKS over the radio.

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP, (OVER RADIO)
dialogues.text: What happened!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, Professor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't do nothin'. Shh! I'm talking to the Professor---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all talking at once and for a moment we cannot understand what is being said. 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You broke it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand, sir. Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd he say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We go to the backup plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Backup plan??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We snuck a bomb in McQueen's pit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The next time he makes a stop, instead of saying "ka-chow," he's gonna go "ka-boom"!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They LAUGH. Mater shudders, upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't feel bad, tow truck. You couldn't have saved him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, wait. You could have!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem and Acer laugh. As they board the elevator:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dadgum lemons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Request acknowledged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Mater's GATLING GUNS rotate out again - a surpr to Mater. But they SPIN IN PLACE, empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem and Acer just laugh more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, you didn't think we'd take your bullets?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater NOTICES SOMETHING. 107.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON WHAT MATER SEES: A small piece of his ropes have been shaved away by the Gatling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He carefully rotates his guns BACK IN, pretending like he seen nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right! You got nothin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as the elevator descends) Who's the lemon now, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice try, Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dadgum!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guns ROTATE OUT AGAIN, SPIN. Mater watches as the spinning barrels SLICE INTO the ropes, do some damage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dadgum! Dadgum! Dadgum!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COMPUTER responds with each "dadgum." The barrels continue to SPIN, CUTTING THROUGH the ropes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PING! The ropes BREAK AWAY and Mater FALLS --- right towa the whirring machinery!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater QUICKLY WHIPS his tow cable around, hooks a pipe an tosses himself to the ramp with a heavy THUD. He doesn't

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta get you all out of there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no time. McQueen needs your help, Mater. 108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I can't, I'm just a tow truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's up to you. Go to the pits and get everyone out. You can do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go and get some more dents, Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater SPEEDS out the front door, a bat out of hell ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Finn and Holley, now closer to death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we'll be "okay"? Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wouldn't have left if I'd told him the truth. (re: his death trap) Being killed by a clock. Gives a whole new meaning to "your time has come."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At this mention Holley seems to perk up, gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time. That's it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spies a GEARBOX below them, at least 20 feet down. Ho

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- but they miss their target. She recoils them back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trying to turn back time. If I can just reverse the polarity...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She FIRES them again. Direct hit! 109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley JUICES the gearbox with HIGH VOLTAGE. The CLOCK ST It reverses itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn and Holley's wheel now rotates AWAY from danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good job! Quick thinking, Holley!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIG BENTLEY, visible from street level, now moves BACKWAR Fast. CRANE DOWN TO ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- Mater, speeding toward the track, unaware.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's everybody on the wrong side of the road for?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn and Holley are now moving in the opposite direction, toward ANOTHER GEAR! And it's going MUCH FASTER. They're seconds from a crushing death...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both DRIVE, fast as they can with FULL FORCE ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burn rubber!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drive HARDER, separating bumpers with just enough ro for the descending gear to SNAP THEIR ROPES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their tires spinning, they both LAUNCH off in opposite directions, LAND HARD on opposing platforms. As Finn sque around to Holley's side of the clock:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get to the course. Calculate the fastest way to ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley pops WINGS out of her side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done. 110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss Shiftwell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're standard issue now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You kids get all the good hardware.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn to leave when they STOP, see SOMETHING. It's an FILTER on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no. That's Mater's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew his escape was too easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn BURSTS out the front doors of Big Bentley, speeds of HOLLEY SMASHES through the clock face, careens into view flying over the traffic ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater bursts through the security gate with aplomb, tears through the pits and stops at MCQUEEN'S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody get out! Get out now! Y'all gotta get out the pits!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENTIRE RADIATOR SPRINGS GANG is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, what are you guys doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here because of you, Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is everything okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Everything's not okay! There's a bomb in here! Y'all gotta get out! Now! 111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - A bomb? - Huh? - Woah.

dialogues.speaker: FINN, (OVER RADIO)
dialogues.text: Mater!

dialogues.speaker: MATER, (INTO RADIO)
dialogues.text: Finn! You're okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, listen to me. The bomb is on you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HIS REARVIEW DISPLAY: We can see that a BOMB has been detected, anchored to Mater's air filter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They knew you'd try to help McQueen. When we were knocked out they planted it in your air filter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater SNORTS, blowing his air filter cover off. Cross-eye Mater sees the explosive device attached to him. He looks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ALLINOL CONTAINER hangs ominously over his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater! There you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater turns. McQueen enters Pit Row, 100 yards away and closing in FAST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop right there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh man, I've been so worried about you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The view of this scene through the window of a luxury box Reveal Zundapp in the window's reflection. He's watching inside. He's poised to push a DETONATOR BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Zundapp's front tire approaches the detonator --- 112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't come any closer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not okay. Stay away from me!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater PEELS OUT BACKWARDS, out onto the track.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, wait. Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP - He hesitates, can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hold everything. A tow truck has just raced onto the track. And he's driving backwards!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He breezes right through his pit, goes after Mater.

dialogues.speaker: DAVID HOBBSCAP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Normally an emergency vehicle on the track means there's been an accident.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Wait, wait. Lightning McQueen is chasing him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater drives up the track. McQueen gains, fast. Because Mater's going backwards, they're face-to-face (but still some distance between them).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, wait! 113.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay back! If you get close to me, you gonna get hurt real bad!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know I made you feel that way before, but none of that matters because we're best friends!

dialogues.speaker: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And McQueen seems to be having a conversation with the tow truck!

dialogues.speaker: DARRELL CARTRIP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I don't know who that truck is, Brent. But I'll tell you what, he's gotta be the world's best backwards driver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL ZUNDAPP is watching this footage from his luxury b The closer McQueen gets to Mater the farther his tire ROL onto the detonator. But he holds back ever so slightly so not to jump the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE TRACK - McQueen gains on Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen, you don't get it. I'm the bomb!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Mater! You are the bomb! That's what I'm trying to say here. You've always been the bomb! And you'll always be the bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Never!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ZUNDAPP. He watches as McQueen SPEEDS UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MCQUEEN. He's had enough screwing around. Here he come

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not...letting you... 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going to catch him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...get away again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen JUMPS FORWARD, in an attempt to grab Mater's HOOK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotta keep away from McQueen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen hooks Mater with his bumper JUST AS ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Request acknowledged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TURBINE ROCKETS slide out of Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my gosh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAWHOOOOOOM!!!!! Mater JOLTS forward with a rocket blast disappears, taking McQueen with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ZUNDAPP. He now freely PUSHES the detonator, but it sa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zundapp can't believe it. He FLIPS OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Francesco speeds along. ZHWAAAAAP! Mater and McQueen ZING PAST HIM with a RED BLUR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is happening? It's a bad dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOW EVEN FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Mater takes a turn, SMASH THROUGH A FENCE and skids around a corner out of sight. A white, smoky JET TRAIL is all that remains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN MCQUEEN'S PIT - All of Radiator Springs watches the television monitors, dumbfounded.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And Lightning McQueen just blasted away, hooked to the now rocket- propelled tow truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overhead P.O.V.: Mater and McQueen swerve through the streets. 115.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zundapp is still furiously hitting the button as Holley d into view just beyond the glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freaked, Zundapp does a 180 and SMASHES out a plate glass window, lands on a ridiculously large balloon tethered to ground, and speeds off ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LEMONHEADS watch, baffled, as Zundapp drives away.

dialogues.speaker: J. CURBY GREMLIN
dialogues.text: The Professor's on the run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone's gotta get McQueen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get McQueen!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem and Acer are already out the door ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn speeds into view, in time to see Zundapp turn a corn out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley. I'll get Zundapp, you help Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley, still in the air, turns ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Holley THUNDERS past Francesco and of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is happening?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn screams around a corner, sees ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- Professor Zundapp, speeding toward docks along the Th where a COMBAT SHIP waits. 116.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, Professor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ZUNDAPP - With Finn gaining fast, he accelerates. Sudd

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's been TETHERED by Finn with tensile cables now attach to his rear end. Zundapp SCREAMS like a little girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really think I'm going to let you float away, Professor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn reels him in. Zundapp spins his wheels, caught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Zundapp miraculously, inconceivably, GAINS TRACT Now it's FINN'S WHEELS that are spinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE COMBAT SHIP - the ELECTROMAGNET has been turned outward and switched on. He's PULLING ZUNDAPP AND FINN IN with the magnetic force. He pulls out a laser, TARGETS it Finn's windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, still towing McQueen, rockets around a corner, zip down another street ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen, let go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass a Gremlin with a headset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON GREM AND ACER - Down another side street. They get thi message, take off in the opposite direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FINN, tires squealing, loses more and more ground to the boat. Zundapp, the "rope" in this tug-of-war, buckles und the tension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give it up, McMissile!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn releases a mess of bullets, grenades, and other weap into the air --- 117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MAGNET SUCKS it in quickly like a black hole ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUNK! It all sticks to the magnet, right next to Finn's bullets. They're BOMBS, GRENADES, ROCKETS and one little detonator with a flashing, beeping light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off the boat's RXN ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KA-BOOOOOOM! A distant explosion (miles away) festoons in the air, visible over the rooftops. Holley suddenly WINGS into view. She sees ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater and McQueen, speeding up the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way! You could get hurt!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then she looks over, catches a glimpse of GREM AND ACER, bearing down on them from a side street. They're going to broadside Mater and McQueen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - They're not aware of the impending impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley DROPS FROM THE SKY, hits the pavement, SKIDS into path of the AMCs and DEFLECTS THEM. They FLIP OVER Holley Finn and McQueen and sail ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- where they skid across the room and SLAM into the bar knocking a ROW OF BEER MUGS to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grem and Acer are pulverized by the bar patrons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley, McQueen and Mater are now stopped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, we've got to get that bomb off you. 118.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's already SCANNING the bomb, working away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bomb?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, they strapped it to me to kill you as a back-up plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back-up plan? Mater, who put a bomb on you?

dialogues.speaker: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Ahhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Professor Zundapp suddenly ROLLS to a stop next to (a now totally freaked) McQueen, entangled in grappling hooks ca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- Finn, who has him leashed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You. Why didn't my death ray kill you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death ray?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn off the bomb, Zundapp!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all so dense? It's voice- activated. Everything is voice- activated these days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deactivate! Deactivate!

dialogues.speaker: BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Voice denied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BOMB suddenly TRANSFORMS into a TIME BOMB, now comple with a countdown mechanism from 4:59... 4:58... Mater GAS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops. Did I forget to mention that it can only be disarmed by the one who activated it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley immediately shoves a GUN in Zundapp's grill. 119.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deactivate.

dialogues.speaker: BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Voice denied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE BOMB'S TIMER: It loses a full minute! Goes from 4:48 3:48 to 3:47... Mater GASPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am not the one who activated it. Would anyone else like to try?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZZZZZZATTT! Holley shocks him unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You read my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was getting on my nerves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR HUGO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: It's very simple.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VICTOR HUGO blocks the entrance to a side street. He's surrounded by Hugo relatives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You blow up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four streets surrounding them are now blocked by each the Lemonheads and their families.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna go out on a limb here. These are the guys that want me dead, correct?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nothing personal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Lemons) Fellers, listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what you're going through. Everybody's been laughing at me my whole life too ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen turns to Mater - he wasn't expecting that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lemons all eye each other, considering Mater's words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- but becoming powerful and rich beyond your wildest dreams ain't gonna make you feel better.

dialogues.speaker: J. CURBY GREMLIN
dialogues.text: Yeah, but it's worth a shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOM!!! He's BROADSIDED by a blast of water from O.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Red! He's sitting outside an underground entrance, followed by Sally and the rest of the Radiator Springs ga

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL OUT WAR ensues between the LEMONS, RADIATOR SPRINGS a with FINN and HOLLEY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FINN attaches his four-way cable hooks to the thugs and springs high in the air, crushing the four of them togeth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOLLEY SPROUTS her wings, and knocks out two cars on her side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guido pulls some LEMON tires off with his air gun. In sec he has a stack of lugnuts next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pit stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Pacers' tires all FALL OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flo hits VLADIMIR TRUNKOV with her high-beams, BLINDING H Sheriff BOOTS him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not today, boys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guido pushes away his tireless thug, YELLING AT HIM IN ITALIAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater KARATE CHOPS lemons, three and four at a time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramone SPRAY PAINTS a lemon's windshield. 121.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Retreat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few Lemons turn back the way they came. BLOCKING THEIR are a line of BRITISH MILITARY VEHICLES clad in digital c led by SARGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for the help, Corporal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything for one of pop's mates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And in the middle of all of this craziness we CUT TO ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- MATER. WRENCH BITS are strewn all around him as Guido tries wrench after wrench to take the bolts off. No dice. Guido gestures wildly, spits Italian a mile a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he saying?! What's wrong!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None of his wrenches fit the bolts!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a light bulb moment for Mater. He eyes the bolts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get it. I get it! I know what needs to be done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No, I can't do it. Look, nobody takes me seriously. I know that now. This ain't Radiator Springs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater looks at McQueen. It is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're yourself in Radiator Springs. Be yourself here. And if people aren't taking you seriously, then they need to change. Not you. I know that, because I was wrong before. Now you can do this. You're the bomb. 122.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no, you're the actual bomb. Now let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, right! Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater HOOKS McQueen and they're off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SHOOT PAST FINN, who's in the middle of battling lem

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's he going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - Flying down a side street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Agent Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need that thing you done before to get me away from McQueen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Request acknowledged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ROCKET THRUSTERS kick in. They head right for a WALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I need you to do the chute, the second kind not the first!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deploying chute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater's chute POPS OPEN, catching air and sending Mater a McQueen SAILING INTO THE AIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater starts to steer them the direction he wants. He and McQueen are FLYING OVER LONDON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The QUEEN, her attendants, assorted dignitaries are here. 123.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's winning the race?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater and McQueen drop from the sky. They land and skid t halt just before the Queen's guards who DRAW THEIR WEAPON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back up! Back away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Lightning McQueen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, it's okay! Tell them, Mater. Explain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay! Somebody's been sabotaging the racers and hurting the cars and I know who. Oh wait... Your Majesty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater BOWS to the Queen. In doing so, the TICKING TIME BO angles into view. The clock's at T-minus 1:53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Bomb! - It's a bomb! - Everybody down! - Look out!

dialogues.speaker: FINN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hold your fire! He can't disarm it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn dives onto the platform and rolls between the Queen Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, I don't know what you're doing but stand down now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (aside, to McQueen) This ain't nothing at all like Radiator Springs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, just cut to the chase!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. 124.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Miles Axlerod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Me? You've got to be crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone exchanges confused looks, including Finn and Hol

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured it out when I realized you all attached this ticking time bomb with Whitworth bolts. The same bolts that hold together that old British engine from the photograph. Holley! Show that picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O-kay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley projects the much discussed PHOTO OF THE ENGINE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then I remembered what they say about old British engines - "If there ain't no oil under `em, there ain't no oil in `em."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is he talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was you leaking oil at the party in Japan. You just blamed it on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Electric cars don't use oil, you twit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you're faking it. You didn't convert to no electric. We pop that hood we gonna see that engine from that picture right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater moves toward Miles Axlerod to pop his hood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This lorry's crazy. He's going to kill us all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles Axlerod BACKS UP to the edge of the stage. 125.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Sir Axlerod created the race, Mater. Why would he want to hurt anyone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To make Allinol look bad so everybody'd go back to using oil. I mean, he said it himself with that disguised voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Dee-sguised voice?" What are you talking about? You're nuts, you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The QUEEN'S GUARDS have had ENOUGH. As has the PRINCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is going nowhere fast. We really should go, Grandmother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One moment. I'd like to see where this is going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, he created Allinol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but what if he found that huge oil field just as the world was trying to find something else?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater sticks his ticking bomb-nose into Miles Axlerod's grill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if he came up with Allinol just to make alternative fuel look bad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "What if?" You're basing this on a "What if"?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, that's it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the QUEEN'S GUARDS spirit the Queen and Prince Wheeli out of there FAST --- 126.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! Somebody save me! The lorry's crazy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now it's just Miles Axlerod, Mater, McQueen, Finn and Hol Miles Axlerod's back tires slip on the edge of the podium he is cornered by Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep away, you idiot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone do something!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone FLINCHES, DUCKS or DIVES FOR COVER except McQuee Mater and Axlerod ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're insane, you are! Deactivate!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bomb FREEZES at 00:01.

dialogues.speaker: THE BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Bomb deactivated. Have a nice day, Sir Axlerod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General shock all around. Miles Axlerod realizes what he' done, looks terrified. Police surround him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater FLINGS Miles Axlerod's hood open with his hook, revealing AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE, oil dripping fro all sides. It MATCHES the photo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The engine from the photo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a perfect match!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did the tow truck figure it out? 127.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's official. You're coming to all my races from now on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're talking!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tire bump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A massive crowd packs the adjacent streets and parks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater does the requisite "silly faces" in an attempt to b the composure of a Buckingham Palace Guard. It isn't work McQueen approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater, let's go. You're on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Queen sits in attention at the front of the Main Ballroom. As Mater and McQueen approach:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Majesty. May I present for the investiture of honorary Knighthood of the British Realm. Tow Mater of Radiator Springs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go get `em, buddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen joins his friends from Radiator Springs. Mater ro forward. He bows, as if he's practiced it all day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hereby dub thee "Sir Tow Mater."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Applause from all around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Sir?" Shoot, you can just call me Mater, Your Majesty. I don't wanna hear none of this "Sir" business. By the way, have y'all met each other? Queen? McQueen. McQueen, Queen. McQueen? McMissile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McMissile, McQueen. Queen? McMissile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He continues introducing everyone as we CUT TO ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The town sign now reads "WELCOME TO RADIATOR SPRINGS - HO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cars surround Mater and McQueen. The rest of the Radiator Springs gang is here too, watches. VAN and MINNY are fron and center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So there I was: rocket jets going full blast, McQueen hanging on for dear life when suddenly them two nasty lemons come out of nowhere, guns drawed. We was goners. But then out of nowhere, this beautiful spy car swoops in from the sky to save us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a very entertaining story, young man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Minny, please. Come on, none of this happened. Rocket jets? Flying spy cars?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you're quite right. It does sound a bit far-fetched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd turns, sees HOLLEY, wings out, swooping in. FIN right below her, driving up the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley! Finn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Mater. It's so nice to see you again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing here? 129.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our satellites picked up an urgent communique.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you got my e-mail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, man. Y'all is gonna have a great time. Everybody! This here's Finn McMissile. He's a secret agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell nobody. And this is Holley Shiftwell. She's ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Mater's girlfriend. It's so nice to meet you all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is shocked. Including Mater. Guido's jaw drops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guido believe you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, honey. You got a nasty dent there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Indeed, Holley still wears the dent from when she saved M from Grem and Acer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (already crushing on her) Was that from when you swooped in and saved them in London?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Van!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? I'm just asking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you worry, sweet pea. My baby Ramone can get that fixed up for you in no time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, sure thing. No problemo. Just let me go get my tools. 130.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no no. I'm keeping that dent. It's way too valuable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater takes this in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A "valuable" dent? Oh, she's as crazy as Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those two are perfect for each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, there's one thing I still don't get. The bad guys hit me with the beam from the camera, right? So why didn't I, you know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Explode in a fiery inferno?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We couldn't figure that one out either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our investigation proved that Allinol was actually gasoline. And Miles Axlerod engineered it so that when it got hit by the beam it would explode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second. Fillmore, you said my fuel was safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen turns to Fillmore. Everyone does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're implying that I switched out that rotgut excuse for alternative fuel with my all- natural, sustainable, organic biofuel just because I never trusted Axlerod, you're dead wrong, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was him. 131.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once Big Oil, always Big Oil. Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tree hugger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A banner says "Radiator Springs Grand Prix."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHERIFF rolls up the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Radiator Springs Grand Prix is about to begin! All spectators clear the starting line!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MCQUEEN heads up Main Street, other racers following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, I can't wait to get rockin'. This is gonna be wicked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we should do this every year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just figured, we never found out who the world's fastest car is. Plus: no press, no trophy. Just racing - the way I like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francesco likes it like this too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen SEES Sally. He and Francesco approach her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francesco. I'd like you to meet ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Signorina Sally. It is official: Lightning McQueen is the luckiest car in the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, thank you ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which he will have to be to have a chance against Francesco today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francesco turns to leave. As he's moving away: 132.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you at the finish line, Mc---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francesco STOPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen has a new bumper sticker: "Ka-ciao, Francesco."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just something I had made up for the occasion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is good, McQueen. Very funny. It was funnier when I did it, but it's very funny. What are you going to do next? Are you going to take off your fenders? Try it. You'll like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francesco leaves. We stay with McQueen and Sally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So he's not so good-looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Nice try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why I love you, Sally. (as he leaves) Wish me luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't need it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drives off. Flo approaches Sally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm-mmm. That Francesco is fine- looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And those open wheels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna have to go get myself some coolant. 133.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The racers at the starting grid. ON THE TRAFFIC LIGHT in center of town. It goes from RED to GREEN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RACERS SPEED OFF, tearing up main street and out of t blazing past tourists ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the racers, led by McQueen and Francesco, take the wid sweeping turn around Willy's Butte we CRANE UP to see MAT FINN, HOLLEY, and the Radiator Springs gang watching. Everyone CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go McQueen!! Whoo-hoo!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holley gets an alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, time to go. Siddeley's gassed, geared and ready to fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn starts to back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're leaving already?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got another mission, Mater. Just stopped by here to "pick something up."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both eye Mater, expectantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something tells me you're not talking about souvenir bumper stickers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her Majesty asked for you personally, Mater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I told you all before. I'm not a spy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know. 134.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spy or not, you're still the smartest, most honest chap we've ever met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget massively charming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater looks over at Holley. He looks touched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, thanks. But as much fun as it was hanging with y'all, this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over to his friends who watch the race, CHEER MCQUEEN ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's alright, we understand. But I'll be back. You still owe me that first date.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If there's ever anything I can do for you, just let me know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I sure appreciate that, thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually... there is one thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MATER, blazing forward fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoo-hoo!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He ROCKETS FORWARD, through the whole town. In doing so h GRABS A BROKEN DOWN OTIS, hooking him ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- and TOSSING him right into Ramone's.

dialogues.speaker: OTIS, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Thanks, Mater! 135.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE "RACE TRACK" - Mater flies past ALL the racers, including Francesco ---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impossible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --- until he approaches MCQUEEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mater!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check it out. They let me keep the rockets!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll see you at the finish line, buddy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if I see you first!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: McQueen and Mater peel away from the rest of the racers, them off the road and into the dirt for another lap. The friends are side by side when we FADE OUT.
